verses.verse: If there <S%H6965>arise<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of you a <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> or a <S%H2492>dreamer<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> and he <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H226>sign<s%> or a <S%H4159>wonder,<s%>

and the <S%H226>sign<s%> or the <S%H4159>wonder<s%> come to <S%H935>pass,<s%> of which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, "Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>" (which you have not <S%H3045>known<s%>) "and let us serve <S%H5647>them;<s%>"

you shall not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of that <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> or to that <S%H2492>dreamer<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams:<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> proves <S%H3426>you,<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> whether <S%H3426>you<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

You shall <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H8104>him,<s%> and keep his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H1692>him,<s%> and cling to him.

That <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> or that <S%H2492>dreamer<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death,<s%> because he has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5627>rebellion<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage,<s%> to <S%H5080>draw<s%> you aside out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to walk <S%H3212>in.<s%> So you shall <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from the midst of <S%H7130>you.<s%>

If your <S%H251>brother,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of your <S%H517>mother,<s%> or your <S%H1121>son,<s%> or your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> or the <S%H802>wife<s%> of your <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> or your <S%H7453>friend,<s%> who is as your own <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H5496>entice<s%> you <S%H5643>secretly,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%>" which you have not <S%H3045>known,<s%> <S%H1>you,<s%> nor your fathers;

of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> who are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H7138>you,<s%> near to <S%H7350>you,<s%> or far off from <S%H7097>you,<s%> from the one end of the <S%H776>earth<s%> even to the other <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

you shall not <S%H14>consent<s%> to <S%H8085>him,<s%> nor listen to <S%H5869>him;<s%> neither shall your eye <S%H2347>pity<s%> <S%H2550>him,<s%> neither shall you spare, neither shall you conceal <S%H3680>him:<s%>

but you shall <S%H2026>surely<s%> <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H3027>him;<s%> your hand shall be <S%H7223>first<s%> on him to put him to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and <S%H314>afterwards<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

You shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> him to death with <S%H5619>stones,<s%> because he has <S%H1245>sought<s%> to draw you <S%H5080>away<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage.<s%>

All <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear,<s%> and shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1697>any<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> such <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> as this is in the midst of <S%H7130>you.<s%>

If you shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> tell concerning <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H5892>cities,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H559>there,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Certain<s%> <S%H1100>base<s%> <S%H582>fellows<s%> are gone <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H5080>you,<s%> and have drawn away the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of their <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%>" which you have not <S%H3045>known;<s%>

then you shall <S%H1875>inquire,<s%> and make <S%H2713>search,<s%> and <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H3190>diligently;<s%> <S%H571>and,<s%> behold, if it be truth, and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3559>certain,<s%> that <S%H2063>such<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> is <S%H6213>done<s%> in the midst of <S%H7130>you,<s%>

you shall <S%H5221>surely<s%> <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> destroying it <S%H2763>utterly,<s%> and all that is therein and its <S%H929>livestock,<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

You shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> all its <S%H7998>spoil<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of its <S%H7339>street,<s%> and shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and all its <S%H7998>spoil<s%> every <S%H3632>whit,<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> and it shall be a <S%H8510>heap<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> it shall not be built <S%H1129>again.<s%>

<S%H3972>Nothing<s%> of the devoted <S%H2764>thing<s%> shall <S%H1692>cling<s%> to your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> may <S%H7725>turn<s%> from the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H5414>show<s%> you <S%H7356>mercy,<s%> and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on <S%H7235>you,<s%> and multiply <S%H7650>you,<s%> as he has sworn to your <S%H1>fathers;<s%>

when you shall <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> all his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
